cab.content: Colonel K. flmiy j0Wi 135IS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITAN1TIC MAJESTY1 S GOVERNMENT. ) W A R CABINET. E C R E T. CONCLUSION OF HOSTILITIES WITH TURKEY.G.T.6351. ' MESSAGE OF CONGRATULATION TO THE GOVERNMENT OF IKDIAT Note by the Secretary. With reference to V/ar Cabinet 497 (Imperial War Cabinet 36), Minute 8, the India Office, in transmitting the telegram approved to the Government of India, despatched a further telegram associating the Council of India and the Secretary of State with the congratulations of the War Cabinet. I am now informed by the India Office that these two telegrams were published immediately on receipt and caused intense gratification in India. The Viceroy has asked the Secretary of State ta convey his deep appreciation of the generous terms in which the message from the War Cabinet was couched. (Sd) MoP.A. HAMEY, Secretary. 2 Whitehall Gardens, S.W. November 22nd, 1918,
